Module.Name: Kinetic conversion factors
Module.Description: Kinetic conversion factors relate exposures or hazard characterisations from one or more external routes (dietary, non-dietary oral, dermal, inhalation) to an internal (target) compartment.
Module.ShortDescription: Kinetic conversion factors convert exposures or hazard characterisations from one or more external routes or compartments to an internal (target) compartment.
Module.DataDescription: Specify nondietary absorption factors as data.
